comments.body:
Created attachment 13532
Updates the jdk recommendations.
Fixed for 5.0.31 and 5.5.5.  Thanks for submitting this patch.

description:
Attaching patch

Also (and let me know if this should be a separate bug), the same page for
version 5.0.29 recomends j2sdk 1.3.1.  Shouldn't it be 1.4.2x at this point?
summary: TC 5.5 documentation lists compatiblility with jdk1.2+
